DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study follow : - To evaluate persistence antibody presence immune memory induce 3-dose primary vaccination Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC ( three formulation ) study DTPwHB/HibMenACTT001 ( CPMS No . 759346/001 ) give unconjugated PRP , PSA PSC 10 month age one subset subject . - To evaluate persistence antibody pertain primary vaccination booster response Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib2.5 vaccine Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC vaccine 15-18 month age subset subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Antibody Persistence , Boostability & Safety Previously Primed Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two stage : At 10 month age , half subject receive dose plain meningococcal AC PRP polysaccharide ( PS ) vaccine 10 month age . At 15 18 month age ( DTP booster phase ) , subject receive booster dose Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib2.5 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : • Healthy child 10 month participate study DTPwHB/HibMenACTT001 ( CPMS No . 759346/001 ) , write informed consent obtain parent . Exclusion criterion : Planned administration/ administration vaccine foreseen study protocol period start 30 day end 30 day administration study vaccine exception oral polio vaccine ( OPV ) . Use investigational nonregistered product ( drug vaccine ) study vaccine within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine , plan use study period . Chronic administration ( > 14 day ) immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug within 6 month prior first vaccine dose . Previous booster vaccination diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , hepatitis B , serogroups A C meningococcal disease and/or Hib since last visit study 759346/001 . History of/known exposure diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , hepatitis B , serogroups A C meningococcal and/or Hib disease . Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , include human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection .
